item.title: Senate Judiciary Expands Probe Into FBI’s Ability To Hide Documents

item.title: Right Media Scooped Jake Tapper On Joe Biden’s Cheap Fake Presidency
item.description: The 'Original Sin' wasn’t the White House cover up, nor was it being deceived by staffers, as Jake Tapper asserts. It was the sin of denial.

item.title: Trump’s ‘Baby Bonds’ Are Just Hillary Clinton’s 2007 Handout In MAGA Clothing
item.description: Republicans called it pandering when Hillary proposed it. That assessment was correct then, and it remains correct now.
